meanings.definition: A rotating platform used for playing vinyl records.
meanings.sent1: The DJ set up the turntables for the party.
meanings.sent2: The turntables spun the vinyl records smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The turntables decided to take a spin on the dance floor themselves!
meanings.sent4: The turntables of time never stop spinning.
meanings.sent5: The turntables hummed as they spun, filling the room with music.

meanings.definition: A device for rotating objects, typically used in DJ equipment.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic fixed the turntables in the car engine.
meanings.sent2: The DJ adjusted the turntables to mix the music seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The turntables at the party started a rotating dance-off!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a set of turntables, constantly spinning new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The turntables whirred as they rotated, creating a mesmerizing display.

meanings.definition: The plural form of turntable, referring to multiple rotating platforms.
meanings.sent1: The music store had a sale on turntables.
meanings.sent2: The turntables in the studio were all in sync.
meanings.sent3: The turntables at the concert formed a synchronized spinning chorus line!
meanings.sent4: The turntables in the DJ booth were a whirlwind of activity.
meanings.sent5: The turntables gleamed under the lights as they spun in harmony.
